title: Ep 106: Say hello to Farewell Exchange with Tonette Griffin
itunes:title: Ep 106: Say hello to Farewell Exchange with Tonette Griffin
description:
Tonette Griffin is back! Here’s what she’s been up to since you last heard her on the show in July 2020: She quit her job and started a fully sustainable clothing business called Farewell Exchange! You send your gently worn clothing, shoes and accessories, and she resells them on the exchange marketplace. By skipping the Goodwill drop off, you can be sure that these clothes won’t hit a landfill. 


Plus, extend the life of all of your leather goods with her product pick! https://amzn.to/3nuVKdw 


Check out Farewell Exchange: https://www.farewellexchange.com/ and follow on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/farewellexchange/ 


Gee Thanks! is powered by subscribers like you! To keep all of our Gee Thanks! content free and accessible to all, consider making a monthly donation of $2 to keep us going. 

Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod and shop all of our recs here: www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 

As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
